body: Needs a bit of tweak [here](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/src/core/lib/compression/compression.cc#L32) too.

```

*****************STATIC******************
  New size                      Old size
 2,020,866      Total (<)      2,020,870

 No significant differences in binary sizes

***************FRAMEWORKS****************
  New size                      Old size
11,177,126      Total (<)     11,177,129

 No significant differences in binary sizes


```

```
Objective-C binary sizes
*****************STATIC******************
  New size                      Old size
 2,020,866      Total (<)      2,020,870

 No significant differences in binary sizes

***************FRAMEWORKS****************
  New size                      Old size
11,177,123      Total (<)     11,177,130

 No significant differences in binary sizes


```

```
Objective-C binary sizes
*****************STATIC******************
  New size                      Old size
 2,026,842      Total (=)      2,026,842

 No significant differences in binary sizes

***************FRAMEWORKS****************
  New size                      Old size
11,324,735      Total (>)     11,324,726

 No significant differences in binary sizes


```
Actually, I changed my mind. Enum ordering is not an API guarantee, it's a Hyrum's Law thing, and we should definitely reorder the enums as many times as we want as long as their names don't change.

```
Objective-C binary sizes
*****************STATIC******************
  New size                      Old size
 2,026,842      Total (=)      2,026,842

 No significant differences in binary sizes

***************FRAMEWORKS****************
  New size                      Old size
11,324,724      Total (<)     11,324,733

 No significant differences in binary sizes


```

```
Objective-C binary sizes
*****************STATIC******************
  New size                      Old size
 2,026,842      Total (=)      2,026,842

 No significant differences in binary sizes

***************FRAMEWORKS****************
  New size                      Old size
11,324,732      Total (>)     11,324,728

 No significant differences in binary sizes


```
I'm requesting that we hold off on merging this change until we get some external guidance about what enum stability implies.

The advice that I'm seeing and to which @AspirinSJL is also on the list is that enum reordering is an API breaker unless we've explicitly declared otherwise. So I'd suggest not doing this unless it is truly unavoidable.

Good to know!

Closing this PR.
